verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, See <WH7200> <WH8798>, I have made <WH5414> <WH8804> thee a god <WH430> to Pharaoh <WH6547>: and Aharon <WH175> thy brother <WH251> shall be thy prophet <WH5030>.

Thou shalt speak <WH1696> <WH8762> all that I command <WH6680> <WH8762> thee: and Aharon <WH175> thy brother <WH251> shall speak <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, that he send <WH7971> <WH8765> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> out of his land <WH776>.
And I will harden <WH7185> <WH8686> Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart <WH3820>, and multiply <WH7235> <WH8689> my signs <WH226> and my wonders <WH4159> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

But Pharaoh <WH6547> shall not hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> unto you, that I may lay <WH5414> <WH8804> my hand <WH3027> upon Egypt <WH4714>, and bring forth <WH3318> <WH8689> mine armies <WH6635>, and my people <WH5971> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> by great <WH1419> judgments <WH8201>.

And the Egyptians <WH4714> shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>, when I stretch forth <WH5186> <WH8800> mine hand <WH3027> upon Egypt <WH4714>, and bring out <WH3318> <WH8689> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> from among <WH8432> them.
And Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> did <WH6213> <WH8799> as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> them, so did <WH6213> <WH8804> they.

And Mosheh <WH4872> was fourscore <WH8084> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, and Aharon <WH175> fourscore <WH8084> and three <WH7969> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, when they spake <WH1696> <WH8763> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872> and unto Aharon <WH175>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

When Pharaoh <WH6547> shall speak <WH1696> <WH8762> unto you, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Shew <WH5414> <WH8798> a miracle <WH4159> for you: then thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8804> unto Aharon <WH175>, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> thy rod <WH4294>, and cast <WH7993> <WH8685> it before <WH6440> Pharaoh <WH6547>, and it shall become a serpent <WH8577>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> went in <WH935> <WH8799> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, and they did <WH6213> <WH8799> so as the YY <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>: and Aharon <WH175> cast down <WH7993> <WH8686> his rod <WH4294> before <WH6440> Pharaoh <WH6547>, and before <WH6440> his servants <WH5650>, and it became a serpent <WH8577>.

Then Pharaoh <WH6547> also called <WH7121> <WH8799> the wise men <WH2450> and the sorcerers <WH3784> <WH8764>: now the magicians <WH2748> of Egypt <WH4714>, they also did <WH6213> <WH8799> in like manner <WH3651> with their enchantments <WH3858>.
For they cast down <WH7993> <WH8686> every man <WH376> his rod <WH4294>, and they became serpents <WH8577>: but Aharon's <WH175> rod <WH4294> swallowed up <WH1104> <WH8799> their rods <WH4294>.
And he hardened <WH2388> <WH8799> Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart <WH3820>, that he hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> not unto them; as the YY <WH3068> had said <WH1696> <WH8765>.
And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart <WH3820> is hardened <WH3515>, he refuseht <WH3985> <WH8765> to let the people <WH5971> go <WH7971> <WH8763>.

Get <WH3212> <WH8798> thee unto Pharaoh <WH6547> in the morning <WH1242>; lo, he goeth out <WH3318> <WH8802> unto the water <WH4325>; and thou shalt stand <WH5324> <WH8738> by the river's <WH2975> brink <WH8193> against he come <WH7125> <WH8800>; and the rod <WH4294> which was turned <WH2015> <WH8738> to a serpent <WH5175> shalt thou take <WH3947> <WH8799> in thine hand <WH3027>.

And thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8804> unto him, The YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of the Hebrews <WH5680> hath sent <WH7971> <WH8804> me unto thee, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Let my people <WH5971> go <WH7971> <WH8761>, that they may serve <WH5647> <WH8799> me in the wilderness <WH4057>: and, behold, hitherto <WH3541> thou wouldest not hear <WH8085> <WH8804>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, In this thou shalt know <WH3045> <WH8799> that I am the YY <WH3068>: behold, I will smite <WH5221> <WH8688> with the rod <WH4294> that is in mine hand <WH3027> upon the waters <WH4325> which are in the river <WH2975>, and they shall be turned <WH2015> <WH8738> to blood <WH1818>.

And the fish <WH1710> that is in the river <WH2975> shall die <WH4191> <WH8799>, and the river <WH2975> shall stink <WH887> <WH8804>; and the Egyptians <WH4714> shall lothe <WH3811> <WH8738> to drink <WH8354> <WH8800> of the water <WH4325> of the river <WH2975>.

And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Say <WH559> <WH8798> unto Aharon <WH175>, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> thy rod <WH4294>, and stretch out <WH5186> <WH8798> thine hand <WH3027> upon the waters <WH4325> of Egypt <WH4714>, upon their streams <WH5104>, upon their rivers <WH2975>, and upon their ponds <WH98>, and upon all their pools <WH4723> of water <WH4325>, that they may become blood <WH1818>; and that there may be blood <WH1818> throughout all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, both in vessels of wood <WH6086>, and in vessels of stone <WH68>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> did <WH6213> <WH8799> so, as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>; and he lifted up <WH7311> <WH8686> the rod <WH4294>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> the waters <WH4325> that were in the river <WH2975>, in the sight <WH5869> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, and in the sight <WH5869> of his servants <WH5650>; and all the waters <WH4325> that were in the river <WH2975> were turned <WH2015> <WH8735> to blood <WH1818>.

And the fish <WH1710> that was in the river <WH2975> died <WH4191> <WH8804>; and the river <WH2975> stank <WH887> <WH8799>, and the Egyptians <WH4714> could <WH3201> <WH8804> not drink <WH8354> <WH8800> of the water <WH4325> of the river <WH2975>; and there was blood <WH1818> throughout all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And the magicians <WH2748> of Egypt <WH4714> did <WH6213> <WH8799> so with their enchantments <WH3909>: and Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart <WH3820> was hardened <WH2388> <WH8799>, neither did he hearken <WH8085> <WH8804> unto them; as the YY <WH3068> had said <WH1696> <WH8765>.
And Pharaoh <WH6547> turned <WH6437> <WH8799> and went <WH935> <WH8799> into his house <WH1004>, neither did he set <WH7896> <WH8804> his heart <WH3820> to this <WH2063> also.

And all the Egyptians <WH4714> digged <WH2658> <WH8799> round about <WH5439> the river <WH2975> for water <WH4325> to drink <WH8354> <WH8800>; for they could <WH3201> <WH8804> not drink <WH8354> <WH8800> of the water <WH4325> of the river <WH2975>.
And seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> were fulfilled <WH4390> <WH8735>, after <WH310> that the YY <WH3068> had smitten <WH5221> <WH8687> the river <WH2975>.
